attributes.action: Dixons Trinity Chapeltown ,Leeds  Ls7 4AW To create a space for prayer.
attributes.additional_details: A main part of Islamic beliefs is salah. Salah is a compulsory act of worship for Muslims 5 times a day . However by the end of the school day 1 prayer time has gone by . Students would like to make a movement to pray salah during lunch time but have multiple times been denied . Please help us change this .
attributes.background: Make it compulsory that schools in Leeds e.g DIXONS TRINITY CHAPELTOWN , have the facility for praying and are allowed to pray .

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the provision of spaces for prayer are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Give secondary school students a right pray in school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631426
